title: Bound by the Past
description: When facing your past results in agony…and ecstasy.When they were younger, Jon and Night helped destroy the Commitment Church, a cult they were both raised in, after a federal agent exposes its seedy underbelly.Years later, Jon’s job as a teacher, coupled with his heated passion for colleague Carly, brings him as close to normal as he’s ever been. But just when happiness is within his grasp, that same federal agent returns…The cult has been rebuilt—with Jon’s evil mother at the helm.Shocked by his mother’s return and his dangerous past come back to haunt him, Jon is terrified of Carly discovering his darkest secrets…including his complex relationship with Night. And his unrelenting need to share Carly with his best friend.
author: Mari Carr
